channel.title: Reseting Banks and Inventorys
channel.description: is there a code i can use to reset all players inventorys and banks?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 06:01:14 PM[/size][hr]any1?

item.title: Reseting Banks and Inventorys
item.dc:creator: @superbum1 superbum1
item.description:
@superbum1 wrote:

uhh there is on my server not sure what the command is…ill get back to u[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 09:59:34 PM[/size][hr]ok put this under ur command list

difficulty 1…

if (command.startsWith("restartchar")) { String player = command.substring(12); int name = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); client b = (client) server.playerHandler.players[name]; b.resetchar(); b.kickTimer2 = 5; b.smitimer = 500; b.notOnNow(); b.sendMessage("Your account has been reset by stevo."); sendMessage(player+" has had their account reset."); }

might want to change stevo to something else like ur acc name

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting Banks and Inventorys
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Well not sure about that. What I do is, go into the perons bank/invo you want to reset. (Make sure there logged out or do this then kick then, so they can log back on.

Go in to your Soruce folder > Character > (Player’s Name) > Now look for the item you want to delete, from there bank/invo/equiped. Don’t delete just replace it with another item ID.

~ Then save > Kick them if there still on > Compile.

Hope that helps!

Read full topic
